product_name: Baffin Nunavut Winter Boots - Women's - Chocolate - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built to keep feet comfortable even in extreme cold, the women's Baffin Nunavut winter boots in chocolate offer warmth, waterproof protection and style so you can play or work in frigid weather. Windproof, waterproof nubuck leather uppers offer total protection; polyester linings are comfortable next to socks and aid moisture transfer. Inner booties with Thermoplush polyester insulation provide warmth and are removable for easy drying. Foam midsoles provide a cushioned, contoured fit and insulate feet against the cold ground. Flexible yet durable rubber outsoles allow comfortable walking while providing excellent traction over ice and snow. Closeout.
short_description: Built to keep feet comfortable even in extreme cold, the women's Baffin Nunavut winter boots in chocolate offer warmth, waterproof protection and style so you can play or work in frigid weather.
